HEX Color Codes: FF5733
111111110101011100110011


My MD5 Hashes are 128 bits
HEX Color Codes are 24 bits

l = 100*hash[0:64]/2**64
a = -125 + 250*(hash[64:96]/2**32)
b = -125 + 250*(hash[96:128]/2**32)
